    • importProducts

      public void importProducts()
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing

      If the user has the "Admin" access level, the menuItem list from the delivery service will be updated with the products from the "products.csv" file

      Specified by:
      importProducts in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing

    • manageProducts

      public void manageProducts(String command, MenuItem managedItem, MenuItem newItem)
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing

      If the user has the "Admin" access level, the menuItem list present in the delivery service will be modified according to the command given

      Specified by:
      manageProducts in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Parameters:
      command - can bee "Add", "Delete" or "Edit"
      managedItem - the item that will be managed in the list, depending on the command
      newItem - the item that will replace managedItem parameter in the list if the command is "Edit"

    • generateReports

      public void generateReports(int startHour, int endHour, int minNumberProducts, int minNumberOrders, int minOrderValue, int day)
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing

      If the user has the "Admin" access level, reports will be generated according to the parameters

      Specified by:
      generateReports in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Parameters:
      startHour - the start hour for the hours report
      endHour - the end hour for the hours report
      minNumberProducts - the minimum amount a product should have been ordered in order to appear in the products report
      minNumberOrders - the minimum number of ordered for a client in order to appear in the clients report
      minOrderValue - the minim value of an order that a client should make in order to appear in the clients report - if the client has an order with the value more than the minimum value, he will appear in the report
      day - the day in which the products should have been order in order to appear in the day report along with the number of orders

    • createOrder

      public void createOrder(int clientId, ArrayList<MenuItem> items)
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing

      If the user has the "Client" access level, an order will be created that contains the order id, client id, date of the order and the items that have been ordered and the total price of the order. A bill will be created in ".txt" format

      Specified by:
      createOrder in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Parameters:
      clientId - the id of the client that made the order
      items - the items that describe the order

    • searchProduct

      public ArrayList<MenuItem> searchProduct(ArrayList<String> filters)
      Description copied from interface: IDeliveryServiceProcessing

      If the user has the "Client" access level, the user will be able to search the items that contain some specified filters

      Specified by:
      searchProduct in interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
      Parameters:
      filters - the array of the filters, each filter being in the form "FilterName:Value"
